subject: Football (College)
Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: A proposed N.C.A.A. settlement is one sign that the reputation of the former Penn State football coach may be rehabilitated after the Jerry Sandusky child-molestation scandal.
snippet: A proposed N.C.A.A. settlement is one sign that the reputation of the former Penn State football coach may be rehabilitated after the Jerry Sandusky child-molestation scandal.
